author: nixo.eth
content: docs have been merged in the pm repo for [championing an EIP](<https://github.com/ethereum/pm/blob/master/processes/2026_championing_an_EIP.md>) & for [setting up breakout calls](<https://github.com/ethereum/pm/blob/master/processes/running-a-breakout.md>): please ping if you have any feedback! these are meant to give champions clear steps to stewarding an EIP to the strongest chance of inclusion (and also give testing & client teams clarity on which are needed & ready)
